title: Leave It to Rina
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>You’re all set, Maki-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Thanks, Rina. Phew, you really get nervous when you’re about to do something you’re not used to, huh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>But aren’t you the one who wanted to do live streams, Maki-chan?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Not really. This kind of thing doesn’t suit me. But Rin and Hanayo said they wanted to try it. So since you’re here, I thought I might as well ask how to do it....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Rina-chan’s board「Woah~」. I’ve yet again learned how you can be kind, Maki-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>It’s not like I’m trying to be nice or anything, though....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I got it. Then I’ll teach you everything about live streaming.... for Rin-chan and Hanayo-chan’s sake. Leave it to me.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Ah, right, about that....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Hm?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Can we do this first one together? I’d love to do a stream with you, Rina.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
